description: Early morning at Tsukiji Fish Market followed by luxury shopping in Ginza.

activities.description: Travel to Tsukiji: Tokyo Metro Hibiya Line from Ebisu to Tsukiji
Visit Tsukiji Outer Market for fresh sushi breakfast
Explore traditional food stalls and shops
Walk to Ginza: 15-minute walk from Tsukiji
Luxury shopping at Ginza department stores
High-end sushi lunch at Ginza restaurant
Travel to Ueno: JR Yamanote Line from Shimbashi to Ueno
Travel back to Shibuya: JR Yamanote Line from Ueno to Shibuya

transportation: Tokyo Metro and JR Yamanote Line
meals: Breakfast: Tsukiji sushi, Lunch: Ginza restaurant, Dinner: Shibuya
notes: Tsukiji is busiest early morning. Ginza shops open around 10 AM. Bring cash for Tsukiji vendors.
